content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I feel my husband so indifferent when I am talking about my daily concerns.
I understand how you feel. I can imagine how frustrating it must be for him to be indifferent when you tell him what you are experiencing. Is this the first time that he has responded this way?
He is always some asshole like this
I' m sorry to hear that. Do you have any friends or family that you can talk to about this?
